A parallel workflow to utilise satellite images as landscape data input

Edwin Tan

2022-08-24

Source: vignettes/more/landscapes-monitoring-workflow.Rmd
landscapes-monitoring-workflow.Rmd

This article describes . To begin, load the main libraries used in this analysis.

library("biodivercity")
library("dplyr") # data processing
library("ggplot2") # data visualisation
